fieldUpdates.description:
Used in CEI rollout.
Stamps LastActivityDate field on Case as the email message created date. Required for the time-based workflow rule that references the last modified date for raising the priority.
fieldUpdates.name: Case Activity Date is NOW

fieldUpdates.description: F2C - Update Cases Status to Owner Not Available
fieldUpdates.name: F2C - Status to Owner Not Available

fieldUpdates.description:
Used in the CEI rollout.
Sets the status to In Routing. Required rather than a default value so that In Process is the default value for the Console Support Process
Edited 8/22 to change from Status to New to Status to In Routing
fieldUpdates.name: Status to In Routing

fieldUpdates.description: Field updates the To Address field which is then passed on to Cisco. Needs to be populated via this formula because Cisco can only interpret 255 characters, so if many emails are cc'd it would not route
fieldUpdates.name: ToAddressToToAddressCINPRT

fieldUpdates.description: Field updates the To Address field which is then passed on to Cisco. Needs to be populated via this formula because Cisco can only interpret 255 characters, so if many emails are cc'd it wouldnt route
fieldUpdates.formula: Parent.ToAddressRouting__c & IF( OR(CONTAINS(ToAddress, "nepackaging@veritivcorp.com"),CONTAINS( CcAddress ,"nepackaging@veritivcorp.com")) ,"nepackaging@veritivcorp.com;","") & IF( OR(CONTAINS(ToAddress, "packaging2@veritivcorp.com"),CONTAINS( CcAddress ,"packaging2@veritivcorp.com")) ,"packaging2@veritivcorp.com;","") & IF( OR(CONTAINS(ToAddress, "eastpackaging@veritivcorp.com"),CONTAINS( CcAddress ,"eastpackaging@veritivcorp.com")) ,"eastpackaging@veritivcorp.com;","") & IF( OR(CONTAINS(ToAddress, "fscustomerservice@veritivcorp.com"),CONTAINS( CcAddress ,"fscustomerservice@veritivcorp.com")) ,"fscustomerservice@veritivcorp.com;","") & IF( OR(CONTAINS(ToAddress, "vtvpkg@veritivcorp.com"),CONTAINS( CcAddress ,"vtvpkg@veritivcorp.com")) ,"vtvpkg@veritivcorp.com;","") & IF( OR(CONTAINS(ToAddress, "jaxnataccts@veritivcorp.com"),CONTAINS( CcAddress ,"jaxnataccts@veritivcorp.com")) ,"jaxnataccts@veritivcorp.com;","") & IF( OR(CONTAINS(ToAddress, "ups@veritivcorp.com"),CONTAINS( CcAddress ,"ups@veritivcorp.com")) ,"ups@veritivcorp.com;","") & IF( OR(CONTAINS(ToAddress, "vtvfs@veritivcorp.com"),CONTAINS( CcAddress ,"vtvfs@veritivcorp.com")) ,"vtvfs@veritivcorp.com;","")
fieldUpdates.name: ToAddressToToAddressJAX

fieldUpdates.description:
Used in CEI rollout.
Pastes the left 255 characters to the 255 address field ("Group To Address") which is used for list views. The 255 field is required because the "To Address" field is not able to be included as a filter in a list view.
fieldUpdates.name: ToAddress to Group To Address

fieldUpdates.description:
Used for CEI rollout to help route cases to Cisco.
Field updates the To Address field which is then passed on to Cisco. Needs to be populated via this formula because Cisco can only interpret 255 characters, so if many emails are cc'd it wouldnt rou
fieldUpdates.formula: Parent.ToAddressRouting__c &IF( OR(CONTAINS(ToAddress, "csroadmap_test_1@veritivcorp.com"),CONTAINS( CcAddress ,"csroadmap_test_1@veritivcorp.com")) ,"csroadmap_test_1@veritivcorp.com;","") & IF( OR(CONTAINS(ToAddress, "csroadmap_test_2@veritivcorp.com"),CONTAINS( CcAddress ,"csroadmap_test_2@veritivcorp.com") ) ,"csroadmap_test_2@veritivcorp.com;","")& IF( OR(CONTAINS(ToAddress, "csroadmap_test_3@veritivcorp.com"),CONTAINS( CcAddress ,"csroadmap_test_3@veritivcorp.com")) ,"csroadmap_test_3@veritivcorp.com;","")

fieldUpdates.name: ToAddress to ToAddress - DAL
Update Assigned to CSP from Queue = True

fieldUpdates.description: If an email reply for an existing case, this will update the field to kick off changing the Case Owner back to the external routing Queue aka "Console Case Queue".
fieldUpdates.name: Update Existing Case Email Pending TRUE

rules.fullName: CC and LC - New Email for Existing Case
rules.description: If an email reply for an existing case, this will update the field to kick off changing the Case Owner back to the external routing Queue aka "Console Case Queue".

rules.fullName: Case - LEX Console Outbound Email Tracking
rules.description: Used for tracking outbound email time and date on LEX Console Cases

When a new email is received on a Case and the owner has their Working Status set to End of Day, Out of Office Received, or Vacation, the Case will be pushed to the Original Queue with the Status of Owner Not Available so the team can see the Case.
rules.formula: and(Incoming , Parent.RecordType.DeveloperName = "Incoming_Fax", OR( ISPICKVAL(Parent.Owner:User.Working_Status__c ,"Out Of Office Received"), ISPICKVAL(Parent.Owner:User.Working_Status__c ,"End of Day"), ISPICKVAL(Parent.Owner:User.Working_Status__c ,"Vacation")))

rules.fullName: First Inbound Email on LEX CONSOLE CASE
rules.description: For cisco routing. Sets the to address fields for routing and for list views. Edited 8/21 to only fire when the to-address has not yet been populated on the case

rules.fullName: LEX - Set Case Type to Incoming Email

rules.description: Used for tracking activity date on console cases

rules.fullName: Set Case Type to Incoming Email

criteriaItems.value: 20. F2C - Inbound Case,22. F2C - Spam,21. F2C - Information Email

rules.description: F2C - If a case comes in from web to case and it is not a fax update record type to denote
